services.title: Front-End Engineering
services.description: Front-End development has evolved so quickly with the introduction of frameworks such as React and Angular to make these processes. I particulary love this area of making these front-end technologies easily accessible and easy to use to help everyone and anyone to become a developer! Note: JAM Stack is the new move.

services.title: Open Source
services.description: Collaboration is everything, and so is Open Source! I enjoy researching and contributing to different Open Source projects and a huge advocate for consumption of these projects.

services.title: Ease of Use
services.description: I love enabling engineerings to do their work proficiently whether that's saving them 5 seconds to 5 hours. I mostly focus on side-projects that I make for fun that helps to enable engineers and help them to enable others as well!
